alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 16 at 11:00AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 9 inches possible. * WHERE...Treasure and Northern Rosebud. * WHEN...From this evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become snowpacked, slick and hazardous, with areas of poor visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...More snow, possibly a few inches, is possible from Miles City to Baker Wednesday night through Thursday.
info.instruction: People may want to delay all travel if possible during the winter storm watch period. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution and be prepared for sudden changes in visibility. Keep track of the latest forecast updates.
